reviewtext: i finally broke down late last year and purchased the DSLR camera i have wanted for years, but couldn't carry it with me on my motorcyle until i found this camera bag. it has plenty of depth to protect the lense, and room at the top for a good quality camera strap.  it fits easily in my motorcycle saddle-bags, so i can carry it on road trips when i plan one.  good product, well worth the price.
summary: excellant protection for a good camera
